mapper.insert:
insert into unicom_alarm_lte
node_name,
mo,
alarm_time,
alarm_name_id,
alarm_type_id,
cell_name,
#{nodeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{mo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{alarmTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{alarmNameId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{alarmTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cellName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select: SELECT node_name nodeName, mo, alarm_time alarmTime, alarm_type_id alarmTypeId, alarm_name_id alarmNameId cell_name cellname FROM unicom_alarm_lte;

SELECT a.node_name nodeName, a.mo, a.alarm_time alarmTime, a.alarm_type_id alarmTypeId, a.alarm_name_id alarmNameId a.cell_name cellname FROM ( SELECT node_name FROM unicom_node_lte WHERE group_name = #{groupName} ) n LEFT JOIN ( SELECT node_name, mo, alarm_time, alarm_type_id, alarm_name_id cell_name FROM unicom_alarm_lte ) a on a.node_name = n.node_name;
SELECT node_name nodeName, mo, alarm_time alarmTime, alarm_type_id alarmTypeId, alarm_name_id alarmNameId, cell_name cellname FROM unicom_alarm_lte WHERE node_name = #{nodeName}
SELECT node_name nodeName, mo, alarm_time alarmTime, alarm_type_id alarmTypeId, alarm_name_id alarmNameId, cell_name cellname FROM unicom_alarm_lte WHERE cell_name = #{cellName}
